jsky.image.gui
Class PickObject

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, ImageGraphicsHandler, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class PickObject
extends PickObjectGUI
implements ImageGraphicsHandler, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

A User interface for selecting objects (stars/galaxies) in an image.

Note that GUI here has some catalog related features ("Add" button, "Table Name" field), but the code that implements these features is defined in the jsky.navigator package.

See Also:
Navigator, NavigatorImageDisplay, Serialized Form
